entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 28.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Fog patches developing late this evening. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 28. Wind chill minus 27 this evening and minus 39 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 14. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h in the morning. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 36 in the morning and minus 22 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 21. POP 30%
